description: WEIS ICE CREAM HALF  HALF PINE LIME  VANILL 1 LTRWEIS HALF AND HALF 1L a delicious frozen combination of refreshing Pineapple Lime Sorbet and creamy Vanilla Ice Cream tub The best of both worlds Weis have taken inspiration from our famous twotone bars and created a 1L Tub to delight the senses The juiciest pineapples with a kick of lime  nothing to tricky just great taste with our decadent smooth vanilla ice cream to round it off all you have to do is enjoy We also have two other delicious flavours in the Weis Half and Half range so give these ice cream tubs a try too Great for sneaky spoonfuls or family gatherings or simply an after dinner dessert treat real fruit and real dairy made the Weis way At Weis our products are based on recipes so the focus is on the subtle blending of real ingredients and ultimately the taste Our knowledge and expertise in sourcing and working with all different kinds of fruits premium grade nuts and natural ingredients enables us to create unique combinations and taste experiences Made in Australia since 1957 Visit our website to find our more about our full range of exciting flavours and our farm to freezer storyThe refreshing flavours of Pineapple Lime Sorbet and Vanilla Ice creamMade with Aussie Ingredients  Real Fruit and Real Dairy  bringing the best of both worlds together1L Half Sorbet and Half Vanilla Ice cream tub a frozen delight for the taste budsQuality ingredients that contain no artificial flavours and are Gluten FreeDelicious 1L tub perfect for family and friend dessert occasionsWeis made in Australia since 1957
name: Weis Half & Half Pineapple, Lime & Vanilla Sorbet Ice Cream 1l
